testcase.classname: US1001 Kullanici Amazon Sayfasinda arama yapar
testcase.name: TC02 kullanici amazonda Java aratir
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici amazon anasayfasinda........................................passed Then kullanici Java icin arama yapar........................................passed And sonuclarin Java icerdigini test eder....................................passed And sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed

testcase.classname: US1003 kullanici parametre kullanarak arama yapabilmeli
testcase.name: TC06 kullanici parametre ile amazonda arama yapabilmeli
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici amazon anasayfasinda........................................passed And kullanici "Java" icin arama yapar.......................................passed And sonuclarin "Java" icerdigini test eder..................................passed Then sayfayi kapatir........................................................passed

testcase.name: TC00 kullanici tutorialsninja sayfasinda telefonlari kontrol eder
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to tutorialsninja............................................passed Then click on Phones & PDAs.................................................passed And get the brandName of phones.............................................passed Then click on add to button for all elements................................passed Then click on black total added cart button.................................passed And get the names of list from the cart.....................................passed And compare the names from displaying list and cart list....................passed And close page..............................................................passed
